function NPC_113083:Init( NPCID ) --[[ PARTS 1 : 손등 2 : 드러머 왼손 3 : 북
USERDATA 1 : 북 2 : 손등 3 : Pain 4 : 현재 Drum 오오라 인덱스 5 : 분노모드 돌입여부 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
NPC_113083.LimitForBreakDrum = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 2 NPC_113083.LimitForBreakShell = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 10 NPC_113083.LimitForPain = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 10 NPC_113083.LimitForRage = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 2
--NPC_113083.LimitForPainBreakPart = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 15 NPC_113083.LimitForPainDrum = 500 -- NPC_113083.MaxHP / 30 NPC_113083.LimitForPainShell = NPC_113083.MaxHP / 10
NPC_113083.TalIdPain1 = 211308308 NPC_113083.TalIdPain2 = 211308309
NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode0 = 211308311 NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode1 = 211308310 NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode2 = 211308331 NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode3 = 211308332
NPC_113083.TalIdMode1Pain1 = 211308328 NPC_113083.TalIdMode1Pain2 = 211308329
NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack1 = 211308304 NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack2 = 211308324
NPC_113083.BufIdsDrumSound = { 40152, 40154, 40156, 40158, 40162, 40164, 40166, 40168 } -- { 40152, 40154, 40156, 40158, 40162, 40164, 40166, 40168 } NPC_113083.DurationsDrumSound = { 10, 15, 15, 20, 10, 10, 10, 10 } NPC_113083.MsgsDrumSound = { "$$ZombieDrum1" , "$$ZombieDrum2" , "$$ZombieDrum3" , "$$ZombieDrum4" , "$$ZombieDrum5", "$$ZombieDrum6", "$$ZombieDrum7", "$$ZombieDrum8"} NPC_113083.BufCount = 8
NPC_113083.TimerIdSetDrum = 1 NPC_113083.TimerIdBufExpire = 2 NPC_113083.TimerIdPainBreakPart = 3
NPC_113083.BufIdZombieSlow = 40161 NPC_113083.BufIdFaint = 40160
end
function NPC_113083:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 5 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
-- 잡기 중 맞았을때 function NPC_113083:OnHitSwallowed(HitInfo) -- reaction if not ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then return end
this:Spewup() -- 뱉기 end
function NPC_113083:SetDrum( ThisNPC, Index ) --GLog( "SetDrum( " .. Index .." )\n" )
local BufIdx = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) -- Clear current drum aura
if BufIdx > 0 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdsDrumSound[ BufIdx ] ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4 , 0 ) end
if Index <= 0 then return end
ThisNPC:NarrationNow( NPC_113083.MsgsDrumSound[ Index ] )
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdsDrumSound[ Index ] ) --GLog ( "SetBuf (" .. NPC_113083.BufIdsDrumSound[ Index ] .. ") \n" )
ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_113083.TimerIdBufExpire, NPC_113083.DurationsDrumSound[ Index ] , false ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, Index ) end
function NPC_113083:OnTimer( Index )
if this:GetMode() == 0 and ( this:GetHP() < NPC_113083.LimitForRage ) then this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode2 ) return end
--GLog( "-----[ OnTimer( " .. Index .. " ) ]-----\n" )
if Index == NPC_113083.TimerIdBufExpire then if this:CheckBPart(3) then return end
if this:IsNowCombat() then NPC_113083:NextDrum(this) else this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode3 ) end elseif Index == NPC_113083.TimerIdPainBreakPart then --GLog("onTimer PainBreakPart") --if this:GetUserData(1) > NPC_113083.LimitForPainDrum then -- this:SetTimer( NPC_113083.TimerIdPainBreakPart, 10 , false ) --else this:ClearJob() this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode0 ) --end end end
function NPC_113083:OnFinishAndAggro( ThisActor, Opponent ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_113083:OnFinishModeChange0( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_113083:OnFinishModeChange0") ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdFaint )
AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetUserData( 1 , 0 )
NPC_113083:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), math.random(1, NPC_113083.BufCount/2) ) --NPC_113083:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), 1 ) end --[[ function NPC_113083:OnStart( ThisNPC, Enemy ) GLog("NPC_113083:OnStart") end function NPC_113083:OnAct( ThisNPC, Enemy ) GLog("NPC_113083:OnAct") end function NPC_113083:OnCancel( ThisNPC, Enemy ) GLog("NPC_113083:OnCancel") end --]]
function NPC_113083:OnFinishModeChange1( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdFaint )
AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetUserData( 1 , 0 )
NPC_113083:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), 0 ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTimer( NPC_113083.TimerIdPainBreakPart, 30 , false ) end
function NPC_113083:OnFinishModeChange2( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdFaint ) NPC_113083:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), math.random(1, NPC_113083.BufCount/2) ) end
function NPC_113083:OnFinishModeChange3( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_113083.BufIdFaint ) NPC_113083:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), 0 ) end
function NPC_113083:NextDrum( ThisNPC ) local NumberOfBufs = NPC_113083.BufCount/2 local BufIdx = ThisNPC:GetUserData(4)
--GLog( "BufIdx" .. BufIdx .."\n" )
if BufIdx == 0 then return end
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then NPC_113083:SetDrum( ThisNPC, ( BufIdx + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs +1 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 2 then local NextBufIdx if BufIdx > NumberOfBufs then NextBufIdx = ( BufIdx % NumberOfBufs + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs +1 else NextBufIdx = ( BufIdx + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs + NumberOfBufs + 1 end
NPC_113083:SetDrum( ThisNPC, NextBufIdx ) end end
function NPC_113083:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_113083:GrappingAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- GLog( "grapiing" )
if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then return end
ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack2 ) if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack2 ) else ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack1 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdGrappingAttack1 ) end end
function NPC_113083:AccDamage( ThisNPC, DataIdx, HitInfo ) -- ( DataIdx == 2 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) ) then if ( DataIdx == 1 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 3 ) ) or ( DataIdx == 2 ) then ThisNPC:SetUserData( DataIdx, ThisNPC:GetUserData( DataIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ) end
--ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + HitInfo.Damage )
--[[ GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage ( P:" .. DataIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. ", all:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) + ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. " )--\n" ) --]]
-- reaction if not ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then return end
-- 북 안치기 if DataIdx == 1 and ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) > NPC_113083.LimitForPainDrum then if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode1 ) then return end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode1 ) end
-- 북 파괴 --[[ if DataIdx == 1 and ThisNPC:GetUserData(DataIdx) > NPC_113083.LimitForBreakDrum then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode1 ) then --GLog( "BreakPart 3\n" ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdChangeMode1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 3, HitInfo.Attacker )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( DataIdx , 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3 , 0 ) NPC_113083:SetDrum( ThisNPC, 0 ) end
return end --]]
-- 손등 if DataIdx == 2 then if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then -- 손등 파괴 if ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) > NPC_113083.LimitForBreakShell then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113083.TalIdPain1 ) then return end --GLog( "BreakPart 1\n" ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker )
ThisNPC:NarrationNow( "$$ZombieBreakShell" )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2 , 0 ) end else -- 파괴된 손등 맞으면 아픔 if ThisNPC:GetUserData(2) > NPC_113083.LimitForPainDrum then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113083.TalIdPain1 ) then return end ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdPain1 )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2 , 0 ) end end end --[[ -- pain if ThisNPC:GetUserData(3) > NPC_113083.LimitForPain then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113083.TalIdPain2 ) then return end ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113083.TalIdPain2 )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3 , 0 ) end --]] end
--[[ HitCapsule Callback functions. --]] function NPC_113083:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) NPC_113083:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_113083:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) NPC_113083:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_113083:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) NPC_113083:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
